Thunder Acres is a family farm in South-Central Kansas near the rural town of Conway Springs. For nearly 100 years, our family-owned and operated farm has raised wheat, cotton, corn, and grain sorghum (milo). As a part if our commitment to bringing our healthy products to a larger group of ...
